sentences.en: Anyone need veggie burger? & nbs p ; Here is the patty.
sentences.cn: 有人要素食汉堡的 吗 ?(素)肉饼在这里.

sentences.en: It'seems as if all of New Hampshire is looking for Patty.
sentences.cn: 仿佛整个新罕布什尔州都在寻找帕蒂.

sentences.en: Later on I'll be speaking to Patty Davis.
sentences.cn: 等会儿我会跟帕蒂·戴维斯谈。

sentences.en: Look, I'm really sorry for nose into that whole Patty rizzo thing.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我真的很抱歉,对PattyRizzo这事多管闲事.

sentences.en: Mike is a university freshman. He is talking to Patty, an upperclassman.
sentences.cn: 迈克是大一新生. 他和他师姐帕蒂在说话.

sentences.en: Patty began reading everything she could get her hands on.
sentences.cn: 帕蒂开始阅读她能找到的所有东西。

sentences.en: Patty questions whether Palmer has had any past indiscretions.
sentences.cn: 派蒂询问帕默是否在过去有过不检点的行为.

sentences.en: Patty, Roger and Daisy are in a grocery store.
sentences.cn: 派蒂 、 罗杰和黛西在一家杂货店.

sentences.en: Patty: Do you have this in navy blue, size seven?
sentences.cn: 帕蒂: 深蓝色的有7号的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Patty: Food? At a teahouse? Cool! Let's order some food!
sentences.cn: 派蒂: 吃的? 在茶馆里? 太酷了! 我们来点些吃的吧!

sentences.en: Patty: I believe you. Then don't sing tonight at KTV.
sentences.cn: 派蒂: 这我相信,那今天晚上在KTV你就不要唱歌好了.

sentences.en: Patty: Miss, I'd like to buy a leather belt.
sentences.cn: 帕蒂: 小姐, 我想买根皮带.

sentences.en: Peppermint Patty is aware of the people in her life and surroundings.
sentences.cn: 派伯敏特·佩蒂在她的生活和周围的环境中意识到人们存在.

sentences.en: Roger: Patty, this is your Aunt Susie and your cousin.
sentences.cn: 罗杰: 派蒂, 这是你的苏西姨妈和表弟.

trans.tran_en: small, flat pieces of cooked meat or other food
